trans-unit.source: If the coordinates are located outside the control, the returned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo> object has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> property of "None"; and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A> properties are set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果坐标位于外部的控件，返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo>对象具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A>为"None"; 的属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.Item%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo.SubItem%2A>属性设置为`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A> method to determine the location of a mouse event in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A>方法来确定的位置中的鼠标事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `listView1` that is populated with items.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名为`listView1`填充有一些项。

trans-unit.source: Associate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event for `listView1` with the `listView1_MouseDown` method in this example.
trans-unit.target: 将关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件`listView1`与`listView1_MouseDown`在此示例中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The x- or y-coordinate is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: X 坐标或 Y 坐标小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text of an item or subitem has the appearance of a hyperlink when the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当鼠标指针经过某个项或子项的文本时，文本的外观是否变为超链接的形式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item text has the appearance of a hyperlink when the mouse passes over it; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当鼠标指针经过项文本时，其外观变为超链接的形式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Enabling hot tracking willcause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property to be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation.OneClick> andthe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A> property to be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 启用热跟踪清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation.OneClick>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HoverSelection%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: In addition, run-time label editing is not allowed when hot tracking is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此外，只有已启用热跟踪时，不允许运行时间标签编辑。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> with hot tracking enabled.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>与启用的热跟踪。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeHotTrackingListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializeHotTrackingListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an item is automatically selected when the mouse pointer remains over the item for a few seconds.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当鼠标指针在项上停留几秒钟时是否自动选定该项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an item is automatically selected when the mouse pointer hovers over it; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在鼠标指针悬停于项上时自动选择项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the user can point to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to select the item.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，用户可以指向中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件以选择的项目。

trans-unit.source: Multiple items can be selected (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to true) by holding down the CTRL key while pointing to each item.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择多个项目 (时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>属性设置为 true) 通过在指向每个项时按住 CTRL 键。

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to provide an easier method for the user of your application to select items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此功能为你的应用程序中选择项目的用户提供更简单的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object used to indicate the expected drop location when an item is dragged within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控件内拖动项时，该对象用来指示预期的放置位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark" /> object representing the insertion mark.
trans-unit.target: 表示插入标记的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> insertion mark feature lets you visually indicate the expected drop location in a drag-and-drop operation when an item is dragged to a new position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>插入标记功能使您可以直观地指示拖放操作中的预期的放置位置时某一项拖动到新位置。

trans-unit.source: This feature works only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A> property is set to `true` and when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not sort the items automatically.
trans-unit.target: 此功能时才起作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A>属性设置为`true`以及何时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件不会自动对项。

trans-unit.source: To prevent automatic sorting, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.SmallIcon?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Tile?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止自动排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sorting%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.SmallIcon?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Tile?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the insertion mark feature may not be visible with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> grouping feature because the grouping feature orders the items by group membership.
trans-unit.target: 此外，插入标记功能可能不具有可见<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>分组功能，因为通过组成员身份对项进行分组功能排列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark> class is typically used in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to update the position of the insertion mark as an item is dragged.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>类通常在处理程序中使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件来更新插入标记的位置，如某一项拖动。

trans-unit.source: It is also used in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to insert a dragged item at the correct location.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序中还使用它<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件以在正确的位置插入拖动的项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark> and [How to: Display an Insertion Mark in a Windows Forms ListView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-an-insertion-mark-in-a-windows-forms-listview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewInsertionMark>和[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 ListView 控件中显示插入标记](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-an-insertion-mark-in-a-windows-forms-listview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The insertion mark feature is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 插入标记功能则仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 上可用的当你的应用程序调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: On earlier operating systems, any code relating to the insertion mark has no effect and the insertion mark will not appear.
trans-unit.target: 在早期的操作系统中，与插入标记相关的任何代码都不会有影响，并且插入标记也不会出现。

trans-unit.source: As a result, any code that depends on the insertion mark feature might not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 因此，取决于插入标记功能的任何代码可能无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: You might want to include code that determines whether this feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 你可能想要编写代码来确定此功能是否可用，并不可用时提供备用的功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to bypass all code that implements drag-and-drop item repositioning when running on operating systems that do not support insertion marks.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能想要绕过实现拖放项重新定位时不支持插入标记的操作系统上运行的所有代码。

trans-unit.source: The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature.
trans-unit.target: 插入标记功能由同一个库提供操作系统主题功能提供。

trans-unit.source: To check for the availability of this library, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法重载并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=nameWithType>值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> insertion mark feature.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>插入标记功能。

trans-unit.source: This example implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events.
trans-unit.target: 本示例实现拖放项重新排序操作使用标准的拖动事件。

trans-unit.source: The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 插入标记的位置更新处理程序中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item.
trans-unit.target: 在此处理程序，鼠标指针的位置进行比较到中点的最近的项，然后使用结果来确定向左或向右的项是否显示插入标记。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是常规输入键还是需要预处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的键是常规输入键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is activated.
trans-unit.target: 在激活一项时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate> event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate>事件发生时用户激活中的一个或多个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property, or with the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过激活某项单击或双击，具体取决于值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>属性，或键盘。

trans-unit.source: From within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate> event, you can reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> properties to access the collection of items selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to determine which items are being activated.
trans-unit.target: 从事件处理程序中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate>事件，你可以引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>属性访问集合中的选定项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>以确定正在激活的项。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名为`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the check state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: 当某项的选中状态更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property must be set to true in order for check boxes to be displayed next to each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>属性必须设置为 true 顺序显示在每个项旁边的复选框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event occurs when the check state of an item changes or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>项的复选状态更改时或当事件发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event to perform tasks such as changing the state of an item's icon or another application-specific task each time an item is checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>事件以执行任务，例如更改每次签入项时的项的图标或另一个应用程序特定任务的状态<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: If the window handle has not been created when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event is raised, the event will be delayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗口句柄尚未创建时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>引发事件，事件将被延迟。

trans-unit.source: Once the window handle is created (when the form is shown), any delayed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: （当显示窗体） 创建的窗口句柄后, 任何延迟<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a checked <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control that handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何检查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>处理控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>事件。

trans-unit.source: The method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemCheckEventArgs.CurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemCheckEventArgs.Index%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected.
trans-unit.target: 该方法使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemCheckEventArgs.CurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemCheckEventArgs.Index%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来检索并计算选定的菜单项的价格。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a `ListView` named `ListView1` and a `TextBox` named `Textbox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个窗体包含`ListView`名为`ListView1`和`TextBox`名为`Textbox1`。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 调用`InititalizeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event is associated with the event handler in this example.
trans-unit.target: 确保<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>事件是与在此示例中的事件处理程序相关联。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the checked state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: 当某项的选中状态更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event, but is raised after the item has been checked.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是类似于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>事件，但选中项之后，将引发。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: 在用户开始拖动项时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemDrag> event occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemDrag>事件发生在用户开始拖动项时。

trans-unit.source: Typically the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemDrag> event performs the task of dragging by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 通常的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemDrag>事件执行的任务通过调用拖动<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks necessary to drag items into and out of your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来执行将项拖入和移出你的应用程序所必需的任务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse hovers over an item.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名为`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemMouseHover> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemMouseHover>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection containing all items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含控件中所有项的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> that contains all the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控件中所有的项。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> returned by this property, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of items.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>返回此属性，你可以将项添加、 删除项，并获取项的计数。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the items in the collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用集合中的项执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>类参考主题。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control with three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects specified and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> objects specified for each item.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>有三个控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>指定的对象和三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>为每个项指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The example also creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects to display the subitems in details view.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象详细信息视图中显示子项。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 这些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the following properties in creating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用以下属性创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have added the code to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要你已添加到代码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selection state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: 当项的选定状态发生更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged> event will occur when the selection state of multiple items changes.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟模式下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged>多个项的选择状态发生更改时，将发生事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> event occurs whether the item state changes from selected to deselected or deselected to selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>项状态是否从所选以取消选择或取消选定更改发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名为`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the labels of items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以编辑控件中项的标签。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can edit the labels of items at run time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户可以在运行时编辑项的标签，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property is set to `true`, the user is able to modify the text of an item by clicking the item text to select it and then clicking the item text again to put the label text into edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>属性设置为`true`，用户能够修改项的文本，通过单击项文本以选中它，然后单击再次要放置到的标签文本的项文本编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: The user can then modify or replace the item's text label.
trans-unit.target: 然后，用户可以修改或替换项的文本标签。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit> events to perform tasks before and after the user edits an item's text.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit>事件以执行任务之前和之后用户编辑项的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text of subitems cannot be modified if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 无法修改的子项的文本，如果此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: To change the text of subitems, you can display a dialog box to users when they double-click a subitem in the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的子项的文本，你可以在它们双击控件中的子项时向用户显示一个对话框。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation.OneClick> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation.TwoClick>, label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation.OneClick>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation.TwoClick>，标签编辑将不允许的值无论<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control with three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects specified and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> objects specified for each item.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>有三个控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>指定的对象和三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>为每个项指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The example also creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects to display the subitems in details view.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象详细信息视图中显示子项。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 这些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the following properties in creating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用以下属性创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have added the code to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要你已添加到代码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether item labels wrap when items are displayed in the control as icons.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当项作为图标在控件中显示时，项标签是否换行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if item labels wrap when items are displayed as icons; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当项显示为图标时，项标签换行，为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelWrap%2A> property is set to `true`, the item text is wrapped to the next line of text if needed.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelWrap%2A>属性设置为`true`，在项文本换到下一行文本，如果需要。

trans-unit.source: If the text is longer than two lines of text, the text is shortened.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本的长度超过两个行文本，则文本将缩短。

trans-unit.source: If the user selects the item, all the item text is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户选择的项，则显示所有项文本。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelWrap%2A> property is set to `false`, all item text is displayed on a single line.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelWrap%2A>属性设置为`false`，所有项文本都显示在单独的行。

trans-unit.source: The entire item text is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelWrap%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 显示整个项文本时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelWrap%2A>设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: This property is only used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.SmallIcon>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是时才使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.SmallIcon>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> to use when displaying items as large icons in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当项以大图标在控件中显示时使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> that contains the icons to use when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" />，包含将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon" /> 时要使用的图标。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> property allows you to specify an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> object that contains icons to use when displaying items with large icons (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>属性允许你指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>包含图标显示项目大图标时要使用的对象 (当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon>)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control can accept any graphics format that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> control supports when displaying icons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件可以接受任何图形格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>控件支持时显示图标。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is not limited to .ico files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件并不局限于.ico 文件。

trans-unit.source: Once an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> property, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to the index position of the appropriate image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>属性，可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>每个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件中的相应图像的索引位置到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>。

trans-unit.source: The size of the icons for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 图标的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Because only one index can be specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties should have the same index positions for the images to display.
trans-unit.target: 因为只有一个索引可以为指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>中指定的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>属性应具有相同的索引位置的显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>设置为 0，用于小型和大型图标的图像，应保持在相同的索引位置中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>中指定的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists.
trans-unit.target: 图像指定了密钥，仍需要将映像的小型和大型版本放在其各自的图像列表相同的索引位置处。

trans-unit.source: When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified.
trans-unit.target: 当视图之间切换，一个列表中的映像的索引位置用于在其他列表中，而不考虑指定的密钥值找到该图像。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to use when displaying items with small icons (all view modes other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon>), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>显示带小图标的项时要使用 (以外的所有视图模式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon>)，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use images to display item state, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用映像来显示项状态，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control with three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects specified and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> objects specified for each item.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>有三个控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>指定的对象和三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>为每个项指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The example also creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects to display the subitems in details view.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>对象详细信息视图中显示子项。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 这些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the following properties in creating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用以下属性创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have added the code to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要你已添加到代码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sorting comparer for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于控件的排序比较器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> that represents the sorting comparer for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" />，表示用于控件的排序比较器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property allows you to specify the object that performs the sorting of items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called or when items are added to the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>属性允许你指定的对象，执行中的项排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>调用方法或项目添加到列表中时。

trans-unit.source: Note that items are not sorted automatically when their label text changes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，项不是自动排序其标签文本的更改时。

trans-unit.source: The specified object must be an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface, which has a single method called <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的对象必须实现的类的实例<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口，具有一个方法调用<xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to provide custom sorting, for example, when a column header is clicked in the details view.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于提供自定义排序，例如，在详细信息视图中单击列标题。

trans-unit.source: To do this, create a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface and provides a constructor that accepts the index of a column to sort by.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，创建一个类以实现<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口，并提供接受要作为排序依据的列的索引的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: You can then implement a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event that creates an instance of this class using the index of the clicked column.
trans-unit.target: 然后，你可以实现的处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>创建使用所单击的列的索引此类的实例的事件。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property to the new instance, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is automatically sorted using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>属性的新实例，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件进行自动排序使用指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method use the same object.
trans-unit.target: 后续调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>方法使用相同的对象。

trans-unit.source: When you set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called automatically.
trans-unit.target: 当你设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>自动调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control that manually sorts items when a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件项中的列时进行手动排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface that performs the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> comparison.
trans-unit.target: 该示例定义一个名为类`ListViewItemComparer`实现<xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口执行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>比较。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建的实例`ListViewItemComparer`并使用它来设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method call in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>事件处理程序使用中定义的方法`ListViewItemComparer`来执行的项，基于所单击的列排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以选择多个项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if multiple items in the control can be selected at one time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以一次选择控件中的多个项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property is set to `true`, multiple items can be selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>属性设置为`true`，可以在中选择多个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: To select multiple items, the user must hold down the CTRL key while clicking the items to select.
trans-unit.target: 若要选择多个项，用户必须按住 CTRL 键同时单击选择的项。

trans-unit.source: Consecutive items can be selected by clicking the first item to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last item to select.
trans-unit.target: 通过单击选择的第一个项，然后在按住 SHIFT 键，单击以选择的最后一项，则可以选择连续的项。

trans-unit.source: You can use the multiple selection feature to select multiple items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and perform an operation on all the items selected.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用多重选择功能选择中的多个项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制，执行对选择的所有项的操作。

trans-unit.source: For example, the user could select multiple items and then right-click a selected item to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks that can be performed on the selected items.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可以选择多个项，然后右键单击选定的项以显示显示一组可以对所选项目执行的任务的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: To determine which items are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定哪些项选择中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> property allows you to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection> that contains a list of the selected items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>属性允许你访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>包含选定项的列表。

trans-unit.source: If you want the index positions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> instead of the items, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望的索引位置中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>而不是项，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>属性来访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to allow multiple selections in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, yet still want to offer the user a way for multiple items to be chosen, you can display check boxes by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要允许进行多选中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，但仍想要为用户提供一种选择，可以通过设置显示复选框的多个项目的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> that allows multiple items to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>这样要选择多个项。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HideSelection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HeaderStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HideSelection%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HeaderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object named `ListView1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> named `TextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>对象名为`ListView1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>名为`TextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 调用`InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LabelEditEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LabelEditEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OnAfterLabelEdit%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OnAfterLabelEdit%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit> event to restrict a newly edited label to characters in the alphabet.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit>事件将限制为在字母表中的字符的新编辑的标签。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> class to obtain the ASCII character code of each character of the new label.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>类来获取新标签的每个字符的 ASCII 字符代码。

trans-unit.source: If the character falls between the ASCII codes that represent numbers, the new label cannot be applied to the item.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字符表示数字的 ASCII 代码之间处于，新的标签不能应用于项中。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control on a form and added items to it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要你已创建了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件在窗体和添加到它的项。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that you have connected the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit> event to the event handler defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还要求你已连接<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit>到事件处理程序的代码示例中定义的事件。

trans-unit.source: In order to use the <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> class, your file must include the <xref:System.Text> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>类，你的文件必须包含<xref:System.Text>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OnAfterLabelEdit(System.Windows.Forms.LabelEditEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OnAfterLabelEdit(System.Windows.Forms.LabelEditEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OnAfterLabelEdit(System.Windows.Forms.LabelEditEventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OnAfterLabelEdit(System.Windows.Forms.LabelEditEventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
